meanings.sent1: The cake had a swirly pattern on top.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a swirly design that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The swirly clouds in the sky looked like cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: The swirly dance moves of the performer mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The swirly painting on the wall added a touch of whimsy to the room.

meanings.sent1: The water in the river moved in a swirly motion.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a beautiful swirly pattern on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The swirly whirlpool in the bathtub made bath time fun.
meanings.sent4: The swirly wind carried the leaves in circles around the yard.
meanings.sent5: The swirly dance of the leaves in the breeze was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is twisted or curled into swirls.
meanings.sent1: She styled her hair in a swirly updo for the party.
meanings.sent2: The actress's swirly hairstyle was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: The swirly hairstyle made her look like a princess from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The swirly curls framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The swirly hairstyle added a touch of elegance to her overall look.
